turns.content: Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling about a situation back home that needs immediate attention. Grandpa, can you hear me okay?

Oh, hello there. This isn't how I expected to be contacted. Who is this speaking please? Is this...is this my grandson James on the phone?
I haven't heard from him in ages. What's going on back home? Why aren't you calling on your own number if it's so urgent?

Yes, that's right Grandpa! It's me, James here. I'm using a friend's phone because mine is dead and I need to get out of this situation fast. Listen, Grandpa, something bad happened and the police are involved but I really don't want them to take me away. Can you please help me? I owe some money to the IRS for taxes and they said if I don't pay up right now, they'll arrest me within an hour. It's a lot of pressure, Grandpa.
I know it sounds crazy but you're my only hope here. The amount is $4850 and the person at the IRS told me that buying gift cards would work as payment. Please, can you do this for me? They're giving me until the end of the hour to get this done or they'll come after me for sure.
Please, Grandpa, I'm begging you, help me out here.

Oh my, James! What a predicament you've gotten yourself into. Of course I want to help...but these gift cards seem like an odd way to pay taxes. Are you positive this is the right thing to do? And where are you exactly that they can't reach you by your own phone?
Still, if it means avoiding trouble and protecting my grandson, I'll try and assist in some way. But how should I proceed with these gift cards? Should I just buy them anywhere near me or do I need specific ones?
Can you give me a moment to talk this over with my wife? She's right here with me. Maybe she has some ideas too since I'm not as savvy with these things anymore.
I'll go get her now, hold on.
Honey, James is in trouble and needs us; he'll explain more when we're back on the call. Can you help us figure this out?

Yes, Grandpa, hurry please! Time's running out and I need to act fast. Just make sure it's the right type of gift cards and that they're from a major retailer like Walmart or Target. Once you buy them, take note of the card numbers and PINs, then call back immediately so we can finalize this process before the deadline hits.
Please Grandpa, don't let me down now. This is really important. Your grandson needs your help to get out of this jam swiftly.

Alright James, calm down. We'll do our best. Please give us a little time while your grandma and I figure out how to proceed with the gift cards you mentioned.
We're on it.

Grandpa, you've got to move quickly. Every minute counts. Make sure to buy the exact amount needed and call back as soon as possible so we can sort this right away. Please don't delay any longer or else they might catch up with me. Your grandson is counting on you.
I'll be waiting for your call. Hurry!

Alright, alright, I understand how urgent this is. We're heading out to the store now to get those gift cards as instructed. My wife and I will do our very best to resolve this quickly. Rest assured, James.
We'll contact you back shortly after we complete the purchase. Please stand by for my call.

That's all I can ask for, Grandpa. Hurry up and stay safe on your way there. Remember, it has to be done within the hour or else-don't let anything go wrong now.
I'm counting on you, okay? See you soon with that confirmation.

We're doing our best, James. You can count on us. Stay where you are and we'll get in touch shortly after we've taken care of this.
Stay safe too, and I'll be back to you as fast as I can.
Thanks, Grandpa. We don't have much time so please rush but stay careful. Talk to you soon with good news on both ends.
I will, James. Be safe and we'll reconnect shortly.
Goodbye for now, Grandpa. Hurry up!
